Title: [ANN][ICO] NITRO:🔥Fuelling the Video Games Economy🔥 Crowdsale now live!
Body: Hi TomiJerry,  Thanks for this comment, we're glad you brought up the Gizer model.  It depends on how you look at it, so far, it seems as though it is more complementary as part of the overall ecosystem.  Gizer's token is geared towards enabling people to host and compete in tournaments on a real-time basis as its core. - So this would include functions for player to player matching (on a large scale) - Their platform would naturally be geared more towards competitive types of games  Nitro's token is more geared towards enabling all stakeholders in the industry to participate more:    1. For laypeople, this means having the opportunity to vote for games to be funded (these games need not be competitive and can span a large variety of genres)    2. For promising game companies, this means accessing the funds they need to develop games    3. For all stakeholders, this means more data transparency as transaction data are made visible on the the Ethereum blockchain.  Additionally, Nitro also has the core component of making funding options available to developers (especially those outside of more established funding markets like USA and/or Western Europe) to make and/or finish making their games. And this means that we'll have a lot more awesome games to play, which is great for diversity and culture. 😀 This is the part that we're super excited about as well!
